mapper.select: SELECT station.id, station.sitename, station.longitude, station.latitude, station.`status`, station.opening_datetime, route_station.route_id, route_station.sequence FROM station INNER JOIN route_station ON station.id = route_station.station_id WHERE route_station.route_id = #{routeId}

SELECT station.id, station.sitename, station.longitude, station.latitude, station.`status`, station.opening_datetime, TRUNCATE(ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(Point(#{longitude}, #{latitude}), Point(station.longitude, station.latitude)) ,2) AS distance FROM station HAVING distance <= #{distance}
